Name: Shoot'n'Scroll 3D
About the game: The game is aimed at all players, from novices to hardcore action gamers. Players can try their skills at 10 levels. As they complete levels, players gain access to new, more powerful enemies and unexpected surprises. Easy game controls allow new players to quickly get in the thick of things. Ready for takeoff? Wheels up! Features . Arcade scrolling shooter . 3 helicopters with different superattack . Various machine guns and rocket . 5 bosses
